page.title: 05PORTWAY INFANT SCHOOL
page.content: { Portway Infant School}opened on 9th January l963 with Miss Smoker,who was in charge of l73 children and 5 teachers. The next headteacher was Mrs. Simmonds and she was in charge until September l975 when Mrs. D. Kent took over. She is now the present head teacher here in l985. Outside the school there is a turning point for cars . A rule has been enforced and made that no-one may stop on the turning point. It has always been ignoredby parents and consequently a child was knocked down. In January l963 Mr. G. Marsh was appointed the school's first caretaker. The next caretakerin October l964 was Mr. H.Allingham. In April l967 he waspromoted caretaker to the Junior School and a Mr. F.Brown succeeded him. In March l969, Mr.Andrews succeeded him. In March
